Uses of Class
MPC.MPCStream

    • Uses of MPCStream in MPC

      Fields in MPC declared as MPCStream 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      MPCStream MPCContext.errStream
      Stream for error output
      static MPCStream mpc.errStream
      Stream to receive error output; generally System.err.
      static MPCStream MPCStream.Null
      Handy for directing output to nowhere
      MPCStream ASTPrintVisitor.ps
      the stream to which to print
      protected MPCStream Phase.ps
      An MPCStream to receive output
      MPCStream MPCContext.verbStream
      Stream for verbose output
      static MPCStream mpc.verbStream
      Stream to receive verbose output; generally the same as errStream, which is typically System.err.
      Methods in MPC that return MPCStream 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static MPCStream MPCStream.getNull() 
      static MPCStream mpc.makeMPCStream(java.lang.String base, java.lang.String ext, java.lang.String which)
      Tries to open the file that makeFilename builds; prints error message and returns null if it fails.
